name: Far Cry 2 User Map
summary: Learn about .FC2MAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FC2MAP files can be shared online and downloaded by other users, which allows them to be used for multiplayer games.

description: Map created for Far Cry 2, a first-person shooter; can be designed and saved using the Far Cry 2 Map Editor; includes the map layout, terrain, and objects, such as vehicles, buildings, and bridges.
